scripts.deploy: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name b4you-production-splitCommissions --zip-file fileb://splitcommissions.zip --region sa-east-1
scripts.deploy:sandbox: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name b4you-sandbox-abandoned-cart --zip-file fileb://splitcommissions.zip --region sa-east-1 --profile vinixp
